derivation: from a derivative of G2992 (λειτουργός) and G2041 (λειτουργός);
strongs_def: a public servant, i.e. a functionary in the Temple or Gospel, or (genitive case) a worshipper (of God) or benefactor (of man)
outline:
1. a public minister, a servant of the state
  2. a minister, servant
    1. so of military labourers
    2. of the temple
      1. of one busied with holy things
      2. of a priest
    3. of the servants of a king
